feed.title: Forcenet: an experimental network with a new header format

entry.title: Forcenet: an experimental network with a new header format
entry.summary: On December 14, 2016, Johnson Lau wrote a message on bitcoin-dev stating that there is no reason to use a timestamp beyond 4 bytes. However, there is a valid reason to do so - lock times. The overflow solution proposed by Lau does not have a solution for this issue.
